tag_list: social-media, sauder, ubc, socialq-media, network-theory, social-architecture
overview:
David is currently a business student at Sauder School of Business in Vancouver, Canada, graduating in May 2010. He has run his own business in sales and marketing for the past three summers and gained competencies in direct selling and marketing educational products and software, and in coaching and mentoring new first year salespeople.

David’s current interests lie in social media development and network theory applications, with a special focus on ‘social architecture’ and how social environments influence choices and decision making.
